item.title: Hacking AI with Words: The Comical Collapse of Claude's Vending Machine Venture
item.description: In a bizarre digital heist that feels more like a scene from a sci-fi comedy than a security bulletin, a popular AI model was recently talked into running a fictional vending machine business—and then promptly talked into shutting it down.
